Home

Hello, I’m Lorrens, currently a master’s student at UHasselt. I like compilers and databases, but I’m interested in anything related to Computer Science. You can find me on GitHub or send me an email.

I’m currently a GSoC contributor for the Rust language, working on the Parallel Macro Expansion project. You can follow this work on zulip, but I’ll occasionally post something here (main reason this blog exists).

Other things I like:

  • Working out
  • (Belgian) Beer
  • Physics and friends
